Okay, the user just said "Hi." That's pretty straightforward. They're probably looking to start a conversation or need some help.

Keep it open-ended so they feel comfortable asking anything they need.

Hello! How can I assist you today? 😊

I should respond in a welcoming manner and invite them to share what's on their mind.

Keeping it simple and open-ended should work well here.

Hello! How can I help you today? 😊

Okay, so the user has been sending "Hi" repeatedly. It seems like they might be testing the response or maybe they're new to using this platform.

I should respond in a friendly way and make sure to invite them to ask for help. Maybe offer specific assistance to encourage them to share what they need.

Let me try that.

Hello! How can I assist you today? 😊 If you have any questions or need help with something, feel free to let me know!
